Text: Aoloffline, Why would you put a Flac Audio in a movie file, when you would of had a DTS audio file. The vast majority of Televisions will not play this as the Audio is not compatible. SORRY MATE YOU KILLED A JOHN WAYNE CLASSIC.
On another issue, It is not a Director's Cut, as back in 1948 when this was made There was no such thing as a Director's Cut.
